sentences.sContent: ...a young couple locked in an embrace.
...today's young women have been pushed to embrace both perfection and passion to pursue science and sports...
...its corporate culture was too rooted in the successes of the past for it to make the clean break necessary to fully embrace the future...

remMethod.val: em(在…内) ＋ brace(胳膊) → 在胳膊里 → 拥抱

words.tran: 拥抱，包含（embrace的现在分词形式）

trans.tranOther: the act of holding someone close to you, especially as a sign of love

trans.tranCn: 拥抱； 包括； 包围
trans.tranOther: to put your arms around someone and hold them in a friendly or loving way
